CustomField.description: Field to capture Manufacturer of Item - Dane's Request - Saurabh 15/03/2022
CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'PAX') , 'PAX', IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'US - P400') , 'PAX', IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'US - A920') , 'PAX', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'WORLDLINE') , 'WORLDLINE', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'INGENICO') , 'INGENICO', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'Ingenico Lane') , 'INGENICO', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'YOMANI COMPACT US P2PE') , 'WORLDLINE', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'VERIFONE') , 'VERIFONE', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'YOMANI') , 'WORLDLINE', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'XENTEO') , 'WORLDLINE', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'YOXIMO') , 'WORLDLINE', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'XENOA') , 'WORLDLINE', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'YONEO') , 'WORLDLINE', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'Worldline') , 'WORLDLINE', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'VX') , 'VERIFONE', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'Verifone') , 'VERIFONE', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'E355') , 'VERIFONE', (IF( CONTAINS( TEXT(Item__c) , 'Yoximo P2PE 4G') , 'WORLDLINE', 'No Manufacturer Found')))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Manufacturer
